Question
========

A researcher wants to investigate whether extraversion (*X*) is related to choice of alpha, gamma or beta studies (*Y*).

What logistic regression model is appropriate for this purpose? 
Answerlist
----------
* Binary logistic regression
* Linear logistic regression
* Ordinal logistic regression
* Multinomial logistic regression

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
